mapper.select: select pi_num,pi_name,to_char(trunc((sysdate-pi_age)/365.254)) pi_age,pi_type,pi_weight, pi_content,ps_email,pi_savefilename,pi_originalfilename,pi_sex,pi_gubun from ppetinfo where ps_email=#{value}
mapper.update: update ppetinfo set pi_name=#{pi_name},pi_age=to_date(#{pi_age},'yyyymm'),pi_type=#{pi_type},pi_weight=#{pi_weight},pi_content=#{pi_content}, pi_sex=#{pi_sex},pi_gubun=#{pi_gubun} where pi_num=#{pi_num}
mapper.select: select pi_num,pi_name,to_char(pi_age,'yyyy-fmmm') pi_age,pi_type,pi_weight, pi_content,ps_email,pi_savefilename,pi_originalfilename,pi_sex,pi_gubun from ppetinfo where pi_num=#{value}
